alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 10:36PM PDT until May 08 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to between 45 and 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph near Gaviota. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range and Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highway 101 through the Gaviota Pass and Highway 154 over San Marcos Pass. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional moderate to strong sundowner winds are expected Saturday afternoon through Sunday night, with additional wind advisories likely.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
